features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Implement user login and registration with JWT tokens. Include password hashing, session management, and logout functionality.
acceptance_criteria: User can register with email and password
User can log in and receive JWT token
User can log out and token is invalidated

features.name: User Profile Page
features.description: Create a user profile page where users can view and edit their information.
acceptance_criteria: User can edit their name and email

features.name: API Rate Limiting
features.description: Add rate limiting to API endpoints to prevent abuse.
acceptance_criteria: Rate limit of 100 requests per minute per IP
